issue.title: [C++] Possibly allow null offsets and/or data buffer for BaseBinaryArray for 0-length arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8339](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8339). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
related to ARROW-8338. This issues was raised in ARROW-7008 but we maintained the status quo of requiring non-null buffers in both cases
